Projects

Below is the list of some software projects that I've created in my spare time.

Solo Engine

No logo
A C++ game engine that I write in my spare time. The main purpose of it is to learn technologies, master software architecture design and to implement an engine that I think is the most convinient to use.

Wireframe

A collection of shaders and materials for high-quality wireframe rendering in Unity. Lines are rendered with the help of geometry shader, so at this moment the package supports only Windows systems running DX10-compatible video cards. Linux or MacOS are not an option because Unity does not (currently) support geometry shaders in OpenGL mode.

Unity3d hardware cursor

The library allows you to change system cursor image and achieve fast and super-responsive custom in-game cursor which does not depend on game frame rate. Library works with Windows and Mac OS X stand-alone builds, does NOT require Unity PRO. Can load cursor images from both files and memory (therefore, from assets too).

UStats module for Nginx

The module provides basic statistics for nginx upstream servers: the number of requests passed to them, the number of errors of different kinds, and so on.
